# uncertainty

A collection of functions for use in assessing uncertainty. Install using 
`devtools::install_github("CWWhitney/uncertainty")`

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(uncertainty)
```
